title: panic: ethash_full_new IO or memory error
body:

Can be one of many reasons. Only way to debug this is to merge [this PR](https://github.com/ethereum/ethash/pull/57) and do a `switch` on the `errno`
Can somebody merge the PR and make a build? I will test it and report back.

I _think_ the issue happens only for users that have a non-latin Windows username:

I0525 16:53:14.410059    7360 backend.go:600] checking DAG (ethash dir: C:\Usersà¸„à¸­à¸¡\AppData\Ethash)

or

I0603 15:32:31.914785    6828 backend.go:598] checking DAG (ethash dir: C:\Users\JÃ¤rjestelmÃ¤nvalvoja\AppData\Ethash)
Heh ... could very well be true. Let us test that.
